definitions: A paved outdoor area next to a house, serving as an outdoor living space.
A row of houses built in a uniform style and joined by common side walls.
A raised flat mound of earth with sloping sides, especially one of a series of such mounds forming a tier.
A level paved area alongside a sports ground or other building, often for spectators to stand on.
examples: We had breakfast on the terrace.
They live in a Victorian terrace.
The rice paddies were built on terraces.
Fans gathered on the terraces to watch the match.
